text: Tango in the Night is the 14th studio album by British American band Fleetwood Mac. It was released on 13 April 1987 through Warner Bros. and went to number 1 in the United Kingdom and Sweden, number 7 in the United States and Switzerland, number 2 in the Netherlands and Germany and number 9 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1987 albums Category:Fleetwood Mac albums
title: Tango in the Night
